snippet: Our sister blog, The Choice, solicits your advice on how to save money on college.
abstract: Our sister blog, The Choice, solicits your advice on how to save money on college.
lead_paragraph: Over at our sister blog, The Choice, Jacques Steinberg tells the story of Rachel Weishoff, an aspiring opera singer who transferred from New York University to Purchase College, a campus of the State University of New York, after accumulating $70,000 in loans after just two years at N.Y.U.
